column1: Little Goat Diner////Stopped in here for lunch on a Wednesday.  Had the chick pea salad (added grilled chicken)
column2: and loved it.  Added a cup of their tomato/apple soup on the side
column3: which was also yummy.  I'm not a fan of tomato soup in general
column4: but the apple made it just sweet enough
column5: while still enjoying the richness of the tomato.  Back to the salad
column6: it was chock full of very fresh and crunchy veggies
column7: and came topped with a few vegetable fritters on top.
